dcterms:description: ScanNet is a richly-annotated dataset providing 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, which includes RGB-D images and camera poses computed by a state-of-the-art SLAM method.

dcterms:description: MegaDepth is a dataset for learning single-view depth prediction from internet photos, providing a large-scale collection of images with depth information.
